mods.abstract: Four home-recorded excerpts of WSM (Nashville, TN) Grand Ole Opry broadcasts, featuring performances by an unknown performer and Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours. Most likely from a non-Prince Albert segment. Closes with announcer "David", possibly David Stone (unconfirmed). Circa mid- to late-1940s.
